Message:
I was surrounded by flames,
my arms embracing
something...black.

With a touch,
it crumbles to dust...

How can those people
do something so horrible?

What did these children
ever do to deserve this?

Nothing...! They’ve done
their best to live without
bothering anyone else...

To hell with love.
To hell with kindness.

to have believed that
there were any sort of
morals in these monsters...

I should have never
believed in any of it...

Those monsters won’t
get away with this...!

I will drag every
last one of them into
their fiery graves!

This town, these people,
this entire world!
